summary: This mod will add  funny weapon that i made for Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
Behold the mighty Mughammer,be in awe.This mod will add weapon that I create for Skyrim based on warhammer.
You will get this weapon by crafting it ,so find any forge and get your Mughammer today.

Installation:
-you can extract it to your Skyrim Data directory  
-or install via Nexus mod manager 

If you have any problem with this mod feel free to tell me.
author: milos779
